segments.text: I would like to pick a time to look at houses with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would mornings or afternoons be best for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is easier for me to take off work in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is best if we can go during the week ; does that work for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because of work , I can only go look at houses on the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to meet at the real estate office , or should I pick you up at home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you could pick me up at home , that would be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could spend most of the day looking at houses to see all that we have to see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That might be a little too much , but we â€™ ll see how it goes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will fax you a schedule as soon as I contact the owners to confirm the times .
segments.speaker: S2
